summary: Hi! I would like to leave the following prompt: Pepper/Tony: Naming children
question: Hi! I would like to leave the following prompt: Pepper/Tony: Naming children
answer:
“I don’t know why you even bothered to get that.” Tony gestured to the several-hundred page A to Z of Baby Names currently open on Pepper’s knee. “What are you going to do, close your eyes and point at random and see if you find something you like?”

Without looking up at him, Pepper shrugged and turned the page. “It’s worth a short. What about these -” She started running her finger down the ‘O’ column. “Oliver, Opal, Orlando …”

“I’m telling you right now, I’m not calling our kid after any part of Florida.”

“Alright. Oscar?”

“No.”

“You come up with some ideas then.”

Tony gave an exasperated sigh. “I don’t know, just something normal. Alex, Tom, Ned -”

Suddenly narrowed eyes flashed up at him. “We are not naming our child after a Game of Thrones character.”

“He is due in December, you know.” A grin tugged at the corners of his mouth as he added, “Winter is coming.”

“No.”

“Well what about -”

Pepper held up a hand. “Natasha sent me a list of all the Starks. So if you’re about to suggest Rob or Brandon, don’t.”

“Ah, well. Can’t blame a guy for trying.”

summary: Welcome! A Hero’s Discord / to hell and back is a private Marvel RP group located on Discord. We are brand new and in search of...
caption:
Welcome! A Hero’s Discord / to hell and back is a private Marvel RP group located on Discord. We are brand new and in search of more members! We welcome all Marvel characters and all verses. Some facts about us: we are strictly 18+, do not accept doubles, do not accept OCs, and regularly schedule in-character events. We’re a bunch of fun-loving souls so send us a message if you have any questions!

Check our taken character list and send us an application! //// mobile nav.

summary: tony, to pepper: hey has steve been acting weird around you, too? today i saw him put a whole, unpeeled mango in his mouth and...
question: tony, to pepper: hey has steve been acting weird around you, too? today i saw him put a whole, unpeeled mango in his mouth and swallow it. like i like mangoes too but he’s going a little far and its sorta scary. i dont know if i can look at a mango the same way anymore — steve, in medical, after having a mango pit removed from him: you dont understand natasha i need to impress him and this is the one non-avengers thing i know about him!!
answer:
natasha: you dumb bi bitch quit eating so many fucking mangoes 

steve: if i don’t he won’t love me

natasha, literally vibrating in annoyance: you dumb bi b i t c h 

pepper, in the other room: yeah tony idk why he’s doing that. maybe u should. u know. ask him. 

tony: omg i can’t he hates me 

pepper: that’s so funny i’ve seen his shrine to ur ass shut up

blog.name: mjrtaurus
blog.title: Just Your Average Art Student
blog.description: Name's Taurus, 22, Ace girl, I draw n' stuff.

summary: Nothing gets Stephen out of sorts worse than a cold stemming from seasonal allergies. He's well enough not to be delirious, but...
body:
Nothing gets Stephen out of sorts worse than a cold stemming from seasonal allergies. He’s well enough not to be delirious, but with how intense his colds can get, he sometimes wishes he was.

The tremors in his hands typically worsen, as do the pain flare ups. The sneezing fits tear through his whole body and leave him dizzy. No matter how many blankets he wraps himself up in, he just can’t seem to get warm. And he gets clingy, too. When he’s sick, he wants to be cuddled, but often there isn’t anyone around the Sanctum. It makes him feel lonely, and when your sick, there’s really nothing worse than feeling lonely.

He spends his time laying in bed, in an absolute nest of blankets, shivering and trying to convince Wong to ditch work and keep him company whenever he stops by. Wong hates seeing Stephen so dejected when he has to tell him no, so he makes a call.

When Tony comes into the room to see a feverish, bleary eyed and sad looking sorcerer poking his head out from beneath the blankets, his heart melts.

Stephen ends up getting more cuddles than he knows what to do with, and it makes him feel just a little less miserable.

title: You know, this people.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2wT62c4

by PachiinsoShad

195 prompts - 195 chapters of the same story.

(POV: Natasha Roumanoff, Wanda Maximoff, Shuri, Tony Stark, Loki, Clint Barton, Peter Maximoff, Peter Parker and Wade Wilson.)

Here, it’s just the life of a few people, that life to decide to not spare.

-> Clint Barton is a trans and deaf man who tries to find work. One day, he meets Pietro Maximoff, a shinning man he falls in love with.

-> Natasha divorces Steve. She goes to town and falls on Shuri, an Afro-feminist who date Wanda Maximoff, a transgender soothsayer women suffering from SED.

-> Tony Stark has just broke up with Pepper and is trying to recover from his burntout and juggling with depression and alcoholism. On Rhodes’ advice, he joins an FB depressive group where he meets Loki, a young genderfluid.

-> Wade Wilson is an soldier horribly mutilated and suffering from serious post-traumatic stress and schizophrenia. One day, he meets Peter Parker, a young agenre harassed by his classmates.

As you can see, it will be fun \o/

Words: 854, Chapters: 1/195, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Loki (Marvel), Clint Barton, Pietro Maximoff, Wanda Maximoff, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), Peter Parker, Wade Wilson, Hogun (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes, T'Challa (Marvel), Okoye (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Vision, Original Characters, Minor Characters
  • Relationships: Loki/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Pietro Maximoff, Wanda Maximoff/Shuri, Wanda Maximoff/Natasha Romanov, Natasha Romanov/Shuri, Wanda Maximoff/Shuri/Natasha Romanov, Peter Parker/Wade Wilson, Hogun & Loki, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Pietro Maximoff & Wanda Maximoff, Shuri & T'Challa (Marvel), Okoye & Shuri (Marvel), Minor Steve Rogers/Natasha Roumanov, Minor Shuri/Vision
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Depression, Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, burn-out, Genderfluid Loki (Marvel), Deaf Clint Barton, Trans Clint Barton, Trans Wanda Maximoff, Trans Peter Parker, Agender Peter Parker, Unhealthy Relationships, Abortion, Feminism, Sexism, Racism, Afrofeminism, Homophobia, Transphobia, LGBTQ Character, LGBTQ Character of Color, LGBTQ Female Character, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Alternate Universe, Hurt/Comfort, They are a lot of tags

by PachiinsoShad

195 prompts - 195 chapters of the same story.

(POV: Natasha Roumanoff, Wanda Maximoff, Shuri, Tony Stark, Loki, Clint Barton, Peter Maximoff, Peter Parker and Wade Wilson.)

Here, it’s just the life of a few people, that life to decide to not spare.

-> Clint Barton is a trans and deaf man who tries to find work. One day, he meets Pietro Maximoff, a shinning man he falls in love with.

-> Natasha divorces Steve. She goes to town and falls on Shuri, an Afro-feminist who date Wanda Maximoff, a transgender soothsayer women suffering from SED.

-> Tony Stark has just broke up with Pepper and is trying to recover from his burntout and juggling with depression and alcoholism. On Rhodes’ advice, he joins an FB depressive group where he meets Loki, a young genderfluid.

-> Wade Wilson is an soldier horribly mutilated and suffering from serious post-traumatic stress and schizophrenia. One day, he meets Peter Parker, a young agenre harassed by his classmates.

As you can see, it will be fun \o/

The movie Legion but winteriron.

Tony as an omega that’s pregnant.

title: Why Stark Industries?
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MyBt1f

by Arkarian7

Peter’s chemistry class get to go to Stark Industries for a field trip. That turns out well for Peter. And his relationship with Tony Stark is revealed.
